thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 16 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Sichuan Chuanhuan Technology sees FY 2017 net profit up 18.58 pct to 36.37 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Sichuan Chuanhuan Technology sees FY 2017 net profit up 18.58 pct to 36.37 pct

organizations.name: reuters) - sichuan chuanhuan technology co ltd

text:
Jan 16(Reuters) - Sichuan Chuanhuan Technology Co Ltd
* Sees FY 2017 net profit to increase by 18.58 percent to 36.37 percent, or to be about 100 million yuan to 115 million yuan
* Says FY 2016 net profit was 84.3 million yuan
* Says increased sales and costs control are the main reasons for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/eAWwu4
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
